abstract.text: Tells the delegate that the user authorized the payment request, and asks for a result.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: The authorized payment. This object contains the payment token you need to submit to your payment processor, as well as the billing and shipping information required by the payment request.
The completion handler to call with the result of authorizing the payment.
The system calls this method after it authorizes the payment request. You submit the payment information to your payment processor to authorize the transaction, and then call the completion handler.

abstract.text: Process Apple Pay payments in your app, and create and distribute passes for the Wallet app.
Represents the result of authorizing a payment request and contains payment information, encrypted in the payment token.
An object that reports the status code and errors for a payment authorization request.
An object that presents a sheet that prompts the user to authorize a payment request.
Methods that let you respond to user interactions with your payment authorization view controller.
Tells the delegate that the user authorized the payment request, and asks for a result.
Tells the delegate that the user authorized the payment request, and asks for a result.
Requests an object that validates the identity of a merchant for a payment request.
Tells the delegate that the user changed the payment method, and asks for an updated payment request.
Tells the delegate that the user changed the payment method, and asks for an updated payment request.
Tells the delegate that payment authorization finished.
Tells the delegate that the user is authorizing the payment request.
The return type of functions that don’t explicitly specify a return type, that is, an empty tuple `()`.

inlineContent.text: The authorized payment. This object contains the payment token you need to submit to your payment processor, as well as the billing and shipping information required by the payment request.
The completion handler to call with the result of authorizing the payment.
